text: Ezɨ isair gumazim asɨzir suer tuzir aghuiba itim asigha pɨn anekagha ghua Solɨn guamɨn anetɨ. Ezɨ Samuel ghaze, “Nɨ gan, kar asɨzir nɨ bagha atɨzim, nɨ anemɨ. God faragha na mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn e ko isar kamɨn ikɨ damam, ezɨ kɨ gumazir kabar diagha, asɨzir kam nɨ bagha anetɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ anemɨ.” Ezɨ Sol dughiar kamɨn Samuel koma api.
